nodes.text: Yuv Kal Zaer was a member of an unknown species that kept record of large-scale experiments on the artificial world of Iokath. A Lead Design Analyst, Yuv Kal Zaer composed the report about the deployment of Iokath weaponry on Test environment JX967A24.
Yuv Kal Zaer is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne in the Codex entry obtained during Chapter IV: Where Dreams Die.
